attributes.action: save Binegar School, a small school in Somerset in the parish of Binegar, which is threatened with closure by Somerset County Council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Somerset County Council has entered into a "consultation" period on the future of Binegar School. Although professing to follow the Government's strategy for small schools, Somerset seems set on a course towards the closure of small schools like Binegar, and we the undersigned petition the Government to support the staff, pupils and parishioners of Binegar to stop the closure of this school.
